Projects About

Hello

Hello. My name is Joshua Kemmerling and I build mobile and web stuff.

I am currently a senior developer at Element, an interactive agency located in Austin, TX specializing in mobile and web design and development. I am the co-founder of Tasty Trailers, a new way to discover food trailers near you, on the go.
